trans-unit.source: Represents the root of the .rules files and contains all the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleDefinitions.RuleSets*> and <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref>s associated with a workflow.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta la radice dei file con estensione rules e contiene tutte le <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleDefinitions.RuleSets*>e <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"> </xref>s associata a un flusso di lavoro.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleDefinitions.RuleSets*>
Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleDefinitions"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleDefinitions"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of rule conditions in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di condizioni della regola del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionCollection"></xref> that contains all the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref>s in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionCollection"> </xref> che contiene tutte le <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"> </xref>nel flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: Determines the difference between <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleDefinitions.Conditions*> and the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleDefinitions.RuleSets*> in the original definition and the changed definition.
trans-unit.target: Determina la differenza tra <> </> *> e <> </> *> nella definizione originale e la definizione modificata.

trans-unit.source: A list of classes that differentiate the originalDefinition from the changedDefinition.
trans-unit.target: Un elenco di classi che differenziano il originalDefinition dal changedDefinition .

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleDefinitions"></xref> property.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> che fa riferimento il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleDefinitions"> </xref> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of RuleSets in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di RuleSet nel flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSetCollection"></xref> that contains all the RuleSets in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSetCollection"> </xref> che contiene tutti gli oggetti ruleset nel flusso di lavoro.
